mandatory.description: The target url for the scan.
The target type of the scan. Possible values are: INTERNET, INTRANET, UNKNOWN

optional.description: The configuration of the web scan.
Active scanning uses known attacks against targets. If this option is enabled OWASP ZAP will actively attack the target.
The AJAX crawler can crawl single-page and JavaScript pages. In case, this option is enabled the scanning will take more time.
